duties_responsibilities.duty: Set up and operate small to large-scale audiovisual systems for live events, ensuring accurate and timely setup, operation, and breakdown of advanced audiovisual equipment.
Troubleshoot technical issues and resolve problems quickly during live events, complying with all security and safety measures.
Provide excellent customer service, collaborate with internal team on event solutions, and maintain positive client relationships through effective communication.
Create an atmosphere that fosters the development of technical and leadership skills in other employees, providing mentorship and coaching to team members.
Perform advanced work with operations team members, supervise and direct other technicians during events, and assist with equipment maintenance and inventory.
Assist with proper security, storage, transportation, and maintenance of audiovisual equipment, as well as forecasting equipment needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree is preferred. Encore Technical Level 3 Certification is required. New Encore team members must be certified by their location within 30 days. 2 - Encore Technical Level Two Core Certifications are required (Audio, Lighting, Projection, Video, Scenic). New Encore team members must be certified by a qualified proctor within 60 days.
